verses.verse: [The prayse of Dauid.] I will magnifie thee O Lord my king: and I wyll blesse thy name for euer and euer.
I wyll blesse thee euery day: and I wyll prayse thy name for euer and euer.
Great is God and most worthy to be praysed: and his greatnesse can not be searched out.
One generation shal praise thy workes vnto another: and they shall declare thy mightie power.
I wyll set foorth in wordes the glorious maiestie of thy excellentnesse: and thy wonderous workes.
I wyll also declare thy greatnesse: so that men shall speake of the force of thy terrible actes.
They shall vtter out of their mouth a memoriall of thyne aboundaunt kyndnesse: and they shall syng of thy ryghteousnesse.
God is gratious and mercifull: loth to be angry, and great in louing kindnesse.
God is good vnto euery man: and his mercie is ouer all his workes.
All thy workes shall confesse it vnto thee O God: and thy saintes shall blesse thee.
They shal shewe the glorie of thy kingdome: and talke of thy power.
That they may make knowen to the children of men his manifolde power: & the glorious maiestie of his kingdome.
Thy kingdome is an euerlasting kingdome: and thy dominion endureth throughout all ages.
God vpholdeth all such as fall: and lyfteth vp all those that be bowyng downewarde.
The eyes of all wayte vpon thee: and thou geuest them their meate in due season.
Thou openest thyne hande: and thou satisfiest the desire of euery thing liuing.
God is righteous in all his wayes: and holy in all his workes.
God is nye vnto all them that call vpon hym: vnto all such as call vpon hym in trueth.
He wyll fulfyll the desire of them that feare hym: he will also heare their crye, and he wyll saue them.
God preserueth all those that loue him: but he wyll bring to nothyng such as be vngodly.
My mouth shall speake the prayse of God: and all fleshe shall blesse his holy name for euer and euer.
